entity.name: person
entity.query: SELECT people.*, faculty.sa FROM people LEFT JOIN faculty ON people.akid = faculty.akid WHERE '${dataimporter.request.clean}' != 'false' OR people.Updated >= DATE('${dataimporter.last_index_time}')

entity.name: appoint
entity.query: SELECT subject, rank, school, acadtitle, startdate, enddate FROM appoint WHERE akid = '${person.akid}' ORDER BY startdate ASC

entity.name: career
entity.query: SELECT * FROM career WHERE akid = '${person.akid}' ORDER BY start_date ASC

entity.name: edrcd
entity.query: SELECT institution, DATE_FORMAT(MAKEDATE(gradyear, 1), '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%sZ') as formatted_grad_date FROM edrcd WHERE akid = '${person.akid}'
